text: Hawkinsville, California is an unincorporated community located about two miles (3.2 km) north of Yreka. It is 2,490 feet (759 m) above sea level.Hawkinsville, California, Roadside Thoughts ==2016 Grade Fire== On August 24, 2016, a fire broke out near the community and burned over 400 acres just two miles north of town.Grade Fire: Some evacuees fleeing, while others staying with their homes, ARIANA RAKHSHANI Ariana Rakhshani, KTVL.com, August 24, 2016 ==References== ==External links== * Hawkinsville Hall Association Facebook page Category:Unincorporated communities in Siskiyou County, California Category:Unincorporated communities in California
title: Hawkinsville, California
